Package cubeAssets

Class Move

java.lang.Object
cubeAssets.Move
public class Move extends Object
Move class represents a single move of the Rubik's Cube. It contains the necessary information for updating the cube state and executing the move.

  • Constructor Details

    • Move

      public Move(processing.core.PApplet sketch, processing.core.PVector rotationAxis, int direction, Cube cube)
      Constructs a Move instance with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      sketch - PApplet object representing the sketch window.
      rotationAxis - X Y Z -axes of rotation direction.
      direction - The rotation direction (1 for clockwise, -1 for counterclockwise).
      cube - The cube to do the move on.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Initiates the move animation.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the move's angle based on the animation and cube's state. If the angle reaches or exceeds half of PI (90 degrees), the move animation stops, and the cube state is updated.

    • isAnimate

      public boolean isAnimate()
      Checks if the move is currently being animated.
      Returns:
      true if the move is being animated, false otherwise.

    • getAngle

      public float getAngle()

    • getRotationAxis
